name: 李昊哲
objective:
練習設計構想草圖速繪法；從基本幾何形體至複雜產品、空間循序漸
進；常用材質（木質、金屬、透明材質、石材及皮革等）之表現技法
；產品精描、透視圖法、三視圖、爆炸圖、組立圖等之精描。
This course put emphasis on offering students having enough skills on :1.Abilities to sketch their idea visible to the others.2.Coloring design sketches to let the drawings have better comprehensibility.
